mapper.select: SELECT wsno, main_poster, goods_title, score, maker_name, price, num FROM (SELECT wsno, main_poster, goods_title, score, maker_name, price, rownum as num FROM (SELECT wsno, main_poster, goods_title, score, maker_name, price FROM wadiz_store_detail WHERE scno=#{scno} ORDER BY wsno ASC)) WHERE num BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}

SELECT wfno, mainimg, fcname, fcno, tag, ftitle, achieve_rate, num FROM (SELECT wfno, mainimg, fcname, fcno, tag, ftitle, achieve_rate, rownum AS num FROM (SELECT wfno, mainimg, fcname, fcno, tag, ftitle, achieve_rate FROM WADIZ_FUND_DETAIL WHERE fcno=#{fcno} ORDER BY wfno ASC)) WHERE num BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
